slides.text: You will learn how to use Github - a social network for programmers. Check it out and then come back - but just take a small look, you DONT need to do anything there yet :-)
For support you will be able to use WizardAmigos Gitter chat. Check it out and then come back - but just take a small look, you DONT need to do anything there yet :-)
You will play a programming game Code Combat. Check it out and then come back - but just take a small look, you DONT need to do anything there yet :-)
And you will build your first web app. Get started now! The world is yours.
